outcome: Civil Reformers discover Halden's protocol to democratize system oversight, stirring optimism.

events.description: Civil Reformers announce the existence of Halden's democratization protocol, causing excitement.
Public forums held to discuss democratic oversight; citizens eagerly participate and propose changes.
Citizen-led councils form, experimenting with grassroots governance structures, gaining momentum in Stenograd.
Council meets to evaluate impacts of democratic oversight discussions, analysts surprised by citizen engagement.
